ingress: The dice provide insight into how the risky challenge of the goes. Now what remains is for you to narrate it out.

success.title: Success
success.body: The Active Character achieves their goal. Whatever challenge they faced, they push through.
success.caption: Describe how they triumph over the horror.

failure.title: Failure
failure.body: The Active Character fails. Whatever challenge they faced, they fall short.
failure.caption: Describe how the situation spirals out of control.

effort.title: Effort
effort.none: No extra effort was pushed. The result stands on its own.

instruction.title: Bring the Scene to a Close
instruction.body: Work together to narrate the final moments of the scene based on these results. When the beat is finished, proceed to update the game state.
